name: MenuButtons
short: red menus to buttons + support for custom menu emojis
description: Converts red menus to buttons and also enables support for custom default menu emojis
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
This cog overrides the default red menu (specifically DEFAULT_CONTROLS and optionally menus.menu) , theoritically just reaction changes shouldnt break anything but buttons *might* break certain cogs, but use with caution. 
 IMPORTANT: TO USE BUTTONS THIS COG REQUIRES SLASHTAGS (from [phen-cogs] - https://github.com/phenom4n4n/phen-cogs)) TO BE INSTALLED (and slashinjector which is required by slashtags)
author: epic guy
